about_the_game:
Neon Magic: Witch shop is a game about developing and operating a witch's shop high in the sky. Adventurers from various worlds need your services. Mutants, robots, anthropomorphic frogs and cats, mushrooms, demons, various heroes, and other fairy tail things will come to your store. Provide them with quality and they will reward you with gold.

The witch's shop not only sells various junk but also offers a range of services such as healing, curse removal, and more.

development:

Develop and improve your store. Upgrade the workshop to produce new goods and expand the store's assortment. Install billboards and expand warehouses. Improve the greenhouse and alchemical laboratory. Do everything to build the best store of all sorts of things in the entire multiverse.

management:

Monitor the quantity of resources and fuel for producing goods. Order ingredients for potions or grow them in your greenhouse. Keep the tower clean and prevent mushrooms, parasites, or curses from appearing. Bargain with customers to make more money or give discounts to increase the store's reputation. Hire assistants who will clean the store or unload goods.

Process ingredients, obtain essences. Experiment to discover new recipes and brew potions in an animated cauldron-demon from another world. Enchant weapons and armor, staffs, grimoires, and scrolls. Create expensive legendary artifacts and animated objects. Become a great potion maker and enchanter.

Only you can choose how to run the business. Become a business shark in the field of selling fantasy junk.
